title: Leadership Style Test
description: What kind of leader are you?

choices.text: Provide clear direction and expectations
Set goals together with the team
Give team members autonomy
Set individual growth goals with each person

results.title: Directive Leader
results.description: You provide clear direction and lead decisively! Your leadership is efficient and results-driven.
results.advice: Listen to your team's opinions too. Different perspectives can lead to better outcomes.

results.title: Democratic Leader
results.description: You value team participation! You create an environment of collaborative decision-making.
results.advice: Sometimes quick decisions are needed. Develop flexibility for different situations.

results.title: Delegating Leader
results.description: You give autonomy to your team! Trust-based leadership lets everyone focus on their roles.
results.advice: Autonomy is good, but provide some guidelines and check-ins. Delegation isn't abandonment.

results.title: Coaching Leader
results.description: You help team members grow! You focus on unlocking individual potential for long-term development.
results.advice: Growth matters, but don't forget immediate results. Find the balance.
